reviews.review_msg: Faran is a great prof. Though he might not be clear at times but you can always visit him during his office hours and he will make sure you understand the matter. Overall he is a good prof.

He is very clear in what he expects from you. Two essays and a midterm along with the final exam. One presentation for tutorial as well. Marking rubric is very clear, and if you do your studying the exams are fairly easy. He is always available for extra help. The textbook saved me for the two essays, I based my entire papers off the textbook.
